definition: memory device consisting of a long thin plastic strip coated with iron oxide, register electronically
details:
noun
- memory device consisting of a long thin plastic strip coated with iron oxide
= synonyms: magnetic tape
- a long thin piece of cloth or paper as used for binding or fastening
= example: a long thin piece of cloth or paper as used for binding or fastening
- a recording made on magnetic tape
= example: a recording made on magnetic tape
= synonyms: tape recording, taping
- measuring instrument consisting of a narrow strip of cloth or metal marked in inches or centimeters and used for measuring lengths
= example: measuring instrument consisting of a narrow strip of cloth or metal marked in inches or centimeters and used for measuring lengths
= synonyms: tapeline, tape measure
- the finishing line for a foot race
= example: the finishing line for a foot race
verb
- register electronically
= synonyms: record
- record on videotape
= synonyms: videotape
- fasten or attach with tape
= example: fasten or attach with tape
